name: fake_data
description: Generate fake data for web developers and web designers.

resource.desciption: The type of fake data you wish to generate.The options are:"addresses","books","companies","credit_cards","images","persons","places","products","texts","users"

_locale.desciption: This parameter means the language of the API response we want to get and accept the locale format "en_EN".

_quantity.desciption: This parameter means the number of rows we want to obtain and accept only integers. If you request more than 1000 rows (maximum) the system will return 1000 rows anyway.

_seed.desciption: This parameter accept an integer and allows to get always the same results. So, executing the same request with _seed parameter set to the same value (ex. 12345) the results will never change.

_type.desciption: (applicable to images)The type of image you wish to get(any, animals, architecture, nature, people, tech, kittens, pokemon).

_width.desciption: width of the image(s) in pixels.

_height.desciption: (applicable to images)Height of the image(s) in pixels.

_birthday_start.desciption: (applicable to persons)Start of the birthdat of person(s), date in format Y-m-d (default: -90 years).

_birthday_end.desciption: (applicable to persons)Ending of the birthdat of person(s), date in format Y-m-d (default: -now).

_price_min.desciption: (applicable to products)Minimum price for products,number in format 10.35 (default: 0.01).

_price_max.desciption: (applicable to products)Maximum price for products,number in format 10.35 (default: none).

_taxes.desciption: (applicable to products)Tax of products in percentage(default: 22).

_categories_type.desciption: (applicable to products)How to show the categories of the product,choices are integer, string, uuid (default: integer).

_characters.desciption: (applicable to texts)length of texts to be generated.

_locale.desciption: This parameter means the language of the API response we want to get and accept the locale format "en_EN".

_quantity.desciption: This parameter means the number of rows we want to obtain and accept only integers. If you request more than 1000 rows (maximum) the system will return 1000 rows anyway.

_seed.desciption: This parameter accept an integer and allows to get always the same results. So, executing the same request with _seed parameter set to the same value (ex. 12345) the results will never change.

custom_fields.desciption: The customed names and the specific type of the data you wish to generate.The input should be a dictionary like this:{"myCustomName1":"customType1","myCustomName2":"customType2"},e.g.{"p":"pokemon"}.The available types are:"boolean","boolean_digit","buildingNumber","building_number","card_expiration","card_number","card_type","city","company_name","counter","country","countryCode","country_code","date","dateTime","date_time","ean","email","firstName","first_name","image","lastName","last_name","latitude","longText","long_text","longitude","name","null","number","phone","pokemon","postcode","state","streetAddress","streetName","street_address","street_name","text","upc","uuid","vat","website","word"

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.desciption: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
